title: Help installing League on my laptop
body:
So I'm trying to install League on my laptop. After Completing the first part of installations, it crashes when installing the patch.
(at 50% or so)

What do I do?

replies.body:
When the client is patching after it first installs, you need to keep a stable connection throughout the entire patching process or it could cause errors like this. Try running through the steps in our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and then let the patcher run again.

Hit me back up if that doesn't help!
